Road Transport Legislation Amendment (Post-Crash Drug and Alcohol Testing) Bill 2025 [NSW]
Schedule 1   Amendment of Road Transport Act 2013 No 18
[80]
Schedule 3, clause 36(8)(b)(i) and (ii)
Omit “other than alcohol” wherever occurring.
[81]
Schedule 3, clause 37(1)(b)
Omit “another specified drug”. Insert instead “a specified drug”.
[82]
Schedule 3, clause 37(2)
Omit “the other drug”. Insert instead “the drug”.
[83]
Schedule 3, clause 39, heading
Omit “accident”. Insert instead “crash”.
[84]
Schedule 3, clause 39(2)
Omit “any drug”. Insert instead “alcohol or a drug”.
[85]
Schedule 3, clause 40, heading
Omit “other”.
[86]
Schedule 3, clause 40(3)
Omit “an accident”. Insert instead “a crash”.
[87]
Schedule 3, clause 40(3)
Omit “same accident”. Insert instead “same crash”.
[88]
Schedule 3, clause 41(1)(b)
Omit “an accident (whether in this jurisdiction or elsewhere)”.
Insert instead “a crash, whether in this jurisdiction or elsewhere,”.
[89]
Schedule 4 Savings, transitional and other provisions
Insert at the end of the schedule, with appropriate part and clause numbering—
Part 
Provisions consequent on enactment of Road 
Transport Legislation Amendment (Post-Crash 
Drug and Alcohol Testing) Act 2025
Definition
In this part—
amending Act means the Road Transport Legislation Amendment
(Post-Crash Drug and Alcohol Testing) Act 2025.
Testing for alcohol and drug use
For a sample taken before the commencement of the amendments made to
Schedule 3 by the amending Act—
(a)
the schedule as amended does not apply, and
(b)
the schedule as in force immediately before the commencement of the
amendments continues to apply.
